committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide for the consideration under the Color of Title Act of a certain parcel of land in Waynesboro, Mississippi.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to act, within a specified period of time, on the application of two named individuals for a patent for a parcel of land in Mississippi despite certain requirements of the Color of Title Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the consideration under the Color of Title Act of a certain parcel of land in Waynesboro, Mississippi.
